message: Alice offers a 60/40 split. Accept this fair offer or we both lose money next round.
Given the 10% depreciation you face vs my 5%, this split is actually better for you than your previous offer would be after depreciation. Let's be fair and avoid further losses.
My offer remains. Given depreciation, this is more fair to you than my initial offer. Accept now or lose even more.

Let's be practical. Due to severe depreciation (29% for you, 15% for me), this split gives us both more value than continuing. Your 4200$ now is worth more than 6500$ at 29% depreciation (4615$). Let's end this efficiently.
